Title: Project South - S611
Notes: Clear spoken audio, persistant hum in the background that may cause an issue with speech detection.
Tasks: Run through medium and large models, track time and assess quality
Testing Focus: Preprocessing (remove background noise). Straightforward transcription task, good for testing model parameters.

Title: Whitmire, Amanda L. Student work, copyright and FERPA: how what you don't know might FERP-YA: Stanford (Calif.), 2020-02-10
Notes: Clear spoken audio, uses language and acronyms that might be challenging for Whisper. Interestingly the auto-captions that are burned in are inaccurate.
Tasks: Run through medium and large models, track time and assess quality

Title: Telmet, Kaja, 1950 Oral history interview with Kaja Telmet, 15 July 2014: Tallinn (Estonia), 2014-07-15
Notes: Clear spoken audio, in Estonian. We have Russian and English translationed caption files. We could ask the content owner to review Estonian captions for accuracy.
Tasks: Run through medium and large models, obtain Estonian captions, track time and assess quality
Testing Focus: Translation (Estonian to English or Russian). Estonian is well-represented in SDR, but has lower accuracy in Whisper multi-lingual model.

Title: USSR Exhibit 401: "German Destruction in USSR", Reel 3
Notes: Clear spoken audio in Russian, some cracks and pops in the background. We have Russian and English translated caption files.
Tasks: Run through medium and large models, obtain Russian captions, translate to English captions, track time and assess quality
Captions / Transcript File? (Type, Lang): Yes (vtt and txt, English and Russian)
Testing Focus: Testing Russian transcription, and/or translation to English. Russian is a high-accuracy Whisper language.

Title: Stanford University. Native American Cultural Center Native American Research Forum : Honoring Native Scholarship. Tape #1: Stanford (Calif.), 1995-04-08
Notes: Inconsistent audio quality due to mic placement, multiple languages (including native languages), tribal names, acronyms, proper nouns.
Tasks: Run through medium and large models, track time and assess quality

Title: Graff, Leonard Leonard Graff of National Gay Rights Advocates (NGRA) at GLAS. Intro by Jeff Golden of the Stanford Gay and Lesbian Law Students Association: Stanford (Calif.), 1984-02-22
Notes: Inconsistent audio quality, many speakers in a room. Some jargon and legalease.
Tasks: Run through medium and large models, track time and assess quality
Testing Focus: Preprocessing (remove background noise). Transcription, multiple speakers. Long duration.

Title: Wallace, Michelle An analysis of red algae cover in relation to Macrocystis pyrifera holdfast presence
Notes: Good audio quality but lots of subject-specific terms.
Tasks: Run through medium and large models, track time and assess quality
Testing Focus:
Transcription. Subject-specific terms.
Speech detection threshold. Contains 15 seconds of non-speech audio at the end of the video, which can produce hallucinations.

Title: Shan, Ali, 1941- Oral history with Ali Shan, 2011 August 21: Fremont (Calif.), 2011-08-21
Notes: English speaking, good quality audio, but has accent and there are lots of place names/proper names.
Tasks: Run through medium and large models, track time and assess quality
Testing Focus: Transcription. Proper/place names. Straightforward transcription task, good for testing model parameters.

Title: Genero, Jack Interviews with five striking Chicana/o students after three days into hunger strike: Stanford (Calif.), 1994-05-06
Notes: Contains some Spanish language and terms as part of the interview.
Tasks: Run through medium and large models, track time and assess quality
Captions / Transcript File? (Type, Lang): Yes (vtt and txt, English and Spanish)
Testing Focus: Translation (English to Spanish). Spanish is a high-accuracy Whisper language.

Title: I Don't Know Where I'm Goin' But I'm On My Way
Notes: Oldest format in our collections, decent audio quality but has pops/crackles. No corresponding Rev file, although we can easily get one.
Tasks: Run through medium and large models, track time and assess quality
Testing Focus: Transcription. Media with degraded/low quality audio.

Title: Mathews, Max V. Improvising Machines master: California, 1971-02-01
Tasks: Run through one model, see what Whisper provides
Testing Focus: Speech detection threshold; hallucinations during non-speech music.

Title: Institut teoreticheskoĭ i prikladnoĭ mekhaniki (Akademii︠a︡ nauk SSSR) A Soviet Ant Takes a Walk: Stanford (Calif.), 1975
Tasks: Run through one model, see what Whisper provides
Testing Focus: Speech detection threshold; hallucinations during non-speech silence.

Title: #28 Tangos, European Peace interviews
Notes: Spanish language singing over music (only side A).
Tasks: Run through medium and large models, obtain Spanish captions, translate to English captions, track time and assess quality
Testing Focus: Spanish transcription. Speech detection threshold; hallucinations during non-speech music.

Title: Blesching, Uwe. Viva Chile m--: Logos Productions, [S.l.]
Notes: Spanish. Speech begins after 30 seconds. Only Part 1.
Captions / Transcript File? (Type, Lang): Yes (vtt and txt for part one, Spanish)

Title: Guerard, Albert J. (Albert Joseph), 1914-2000 Albert J. Guerard panel on novel
